title: (x) Extended slab serif font - Hellenic Wide (several similar) {Patricia}
content:
Hello everyone--

I've searched through my books and a couple of those online type identifier gizmos with questionnaires, but I couldn't find an exact match to this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020233514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/biz.jpg)

Any help would be appreciated. Thanks in advance!

--Kevo
author: kevos12

comments.content:
Looks like Hefty (a.k.a. Hellenic Wide)

[http://www.buyfonts.com/value\_for\_money/hefty.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20141020233514/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/hefty.htm "http://www.buyfonts.com/value\_for\_money/hefty.htm")

58 Rodeo and Zapata are similar

The nail has been hit on the head!  
Thanks for the ID, and the link!

--Kevo
yep - I pawed thru those to find the Hefty link.
